content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Good to meet you, Max. So, you're looking for a place to rent in Mannheim? And what kind of rental price are you looking for? I'm sure we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Mister Heine, I would like to negotiate the rental price of the apartment. I would like to know how much you would like to charge for it.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Well, Max, I'm happy to negotiate the rental price with you. The apartment is 25 square meters and is located in a prime location in Mannheim. I would like to charge €800 per month for it. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to accept the rental price of €800 per month. I agree to the price.

Thank you for your offer, Mister Heine. I will move into the apartment as soon as possible. I appreciate your help.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Great to hear that, Max. I'm glad you found the apartment to your liking and are willing to pay the rental price I've proposed. I'm sure you'll enjoy living in Mannheim and taking advantage of all the city has to offer. If you have any questions or need any assistance during the move-in process, don't hesitate to let me know.
name: Heinrich Heine
